title: Apple releases macOS 12.3 beta 4 to developers as Universal Control launch nears
content:
As we move closer to a public release, Apple has seeded developers with macOS 12.3 beta 4. The software arrives as the fourth build to officially include Universal Control to seamlessly work between Mac and iPad.

more…

description: Apple has released macOS 12.3 beta 4. The latest test build features Universal Control, support for the PS5 adaptive trigger, and more.
